original_text: Then I will remember the covenant that I have made with you and with all the different kinds of living things. Never again will the water become so deep that it destroys everything that lives.
korean_text: 내가 나와 너희와 및 육체를 가진 모든 생물 사이의 내 언약을 기억하리니 다시는 물이 모든 육체를 멸하는 홍수가 되지 아니할지라

sentences.original_text: that I have made with you
and with all the different kinds of living things
Never again will the water become so deep
sentences.korean_translation: 다시는 물이 그렇게 깊어지지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that it destroys everything that lives
